news.title: New observability console now live
news.body: We refreshed the Prism console with consolidated CI, Lighthouse, and funnel views so ops can ship faster.

news.title: Guided MathLab tour enters experiment
news.body: A/B test kicking off this week to measure completion lift from the new guided geodesic walkthrough.

news.title: February release train ready for GA
news.body: Release 2025.7 wraps compliance automation and network hardening—pending green light from SRE.
